message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm extending this opportunity to you for a special introductory price of $95. This is a limited time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer!  The product looks great, but I'm working with a bit of a tighter budget.  Would you be willing to come down to $80?

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In order to accommodate your needs while still valuing our product, I propose an offer of $85. This is my best offer for now.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we meet in the middle at $82.50?
I'm glad you're finding our offer appealing, Bob. Considering the value and quality of the product, I'm willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $84. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
